org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.allocator

Class ShardsAllocators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.allocator.ShardsAllocators
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShardsAllocator

    public class ShardsAllocators
extends AbstractComponent
implements ShardsAllocator
    The ShardsAllocator class offers methods for allocating shard within a cluster. These methods include moving shards and re-balancing the cluster. It also allows management of shards by their state.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent

    • Method Detail

      • applyStartedShards

        public void applyStartedShards(StartedRerouteAllocation allocation)
        Description copied from interface: ShardsAllocator
        Applies changes on started nodes based on the implemented algorithm. For example if a shard has changed to ShardRoutingState.STARTED from ShardRoutingState.RELOCATING this allocator might apply some cleanups on the node that used to hold the shard.
        Specified by:
        applyStartedShards in interface ShardsAllocator
        Parameters:
        allocation - all started shards

      • applyFailedShards

        Specified by:
        applyFailedShards in interface ShardsAllocator
        Parameters:
        allocation - all failed shards

        Specified by:
